MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KA17 postcode area of Darvel. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:27pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the repairs required to our overhead electricity network near Dyke Farm TV Station and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:06pm on Wednesday, 18 November 2020.
